solution_line_template: One pizza costs twice as much as the burger, which means {burger_cost} * {pizza_multiplier} = $<<{burger_cost}*{pizza_multiplier}={pizza_cost}>>{pizza_cost}.
So one pizza and three burgers would cost in total {pizza_cost} + {burgers_total} = $<<{pizza_cost}+{burgers_total}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
